content.raw:
So far I've mainly been thinking about this feature system from the perspective of the interface for physics plugin providers, and this does a great job with that interface.

As I think about it from the other side of the interface, such a user of `ign-gazebo` who wants to load a xml model / world file and then call ign-physics, I'm wondering how much knowledge `ign-gazebo` is required to have about all these features. Would a world file be able to list required features in text format? Currently, FeatureLists just supports symbols as a template parameter.
